name: Keith Brian Gallagher
content: Keith Gallagher Welcome, one and all to my FIT web page University Home School of Computing Home Computer Sciences Home kgallagher@fit.edu(REMOVE IF YOU ARE HUMAN) My University Front Page Curriculum Vitae (.pdf) The Schtick Current Courses Finding Me Find me on Google Scholar I'm in the top 5! (twice!) WFIT Radio Interview (of me) This site under (permanent) maintenance! Hi, I'm Dr Keith Gallagher. I argue for a radical premise: there is no such thing as software development. Development is maintenance on the empty system. Development is merely a special case of maintenance. ...or me... Monkey Sorting Demo: Type some (unsorted and different) values in the "Inny" box and see what the monkeys do.... After a bit, keep hitting return to see what the monkeys do next. How many tries does it take the monkeys get your inputs in order? Inny: Outty: Count: The MonkeySort Paper MonkeySort Slides MonkeySort C Source (That I use in classes. Comments to /dev/null) Keith Brian Gallagher, PhD | Department of Computer Sciences and Cyber Security | Tel. +1 321 674 8395
